name: Retro Template
description:
I've combined a couple of retrospective agile templates into one for yesterday's retro meeting. With FigJam components and stamps it's really easy and fun. One doesn't need to copy and paste notes and stuff and can simply use the native tools on top of this simple grid.


"Start Stop Keep" is a goal-oriented planning process that uses retrospection to help teams determine what actions to stop and what new ideas are worth trying.


Our Karma team loved it!


Please feel free to change it to: MAD, SAD, GLAD or whatever works for you.
